email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $51.25 works for us, and the demurrage rate is acceptable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15-20 October? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed as discussed. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Cheers, John
